title: Temperature, humidity, and ionisation effect of iodine oxoacid nucleation

Kuerten, Houssni Lamkaddam, Chuan Ping Lee, Vladimir Makhmutov, Hanna E Manninen, Guillaume MARIE, Ruby Marten, Bernhard Mentler, Antti Onnela, Maxim Philippov, Wiebke Scholz, Mario Simon, Dominik Stolzenburg, Yee Jun Tham, António Tomé, Andrea C Wagner, Mingyi Wang, Dongyu Wang, Yonghong Wang, Stefan K Weber, Marcel Zauner-Wieczorek, Urs Baltensperger, Joachim Curtius, Neil McPherson Donahue, Imad El Haddad, Richard Flagan, Armin Hansel, Ottmar Moehler, Tuukka Petäjä, Rainer Volkamer, Doug Worsnop, Katrianne Lehtipalo
Iodine oxoacids are recognised for their significant contribution to the formation of new particles in coastal and polar atmospheres. Nevertheless, to incorporate the iodine oxoacid nucleation mechanism into global simulations,...
